entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero except minus 4 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low zero except minus 4 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then northwest 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023
